product_description.manufacturing_process: Ready-mix concrete is produced at batching plants where controlled operations allow precise mix designs resulting in a product that is delivered to construction sites in a freshly mixed, plastic, or unhardened state.

impact_categories_calculated: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM)
Use of non-renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM)
lca_information.data_quality: Foreground data on raw material requirements, manufacture and distribution was provided as primary source by Holcim (NZ) for the year January 2022 - December 2022.

transport_and_installation.transportation: All materials used for producing ready-mix concretes were transported via truck. Aggregates and cements were assumed to be transported by heavy trucks and other raw materials by medium trucks.
transport_and_installation.installation: Emissions from construction installation (A5) were excluded as Holcim (NZ) does not have operational control over the installation of products at the construction site.

end_of_life.deconstruction: Deconstruction (C1) is assumed to use drilling to break and remove the concrete.
end_of_life.transport_to_landfill: The distance for waste collecting from construction site (C2) to landfill plant is assumed 50km.
end_of_life.disposal: All products are assumed to be landfilled (C4) and there is no carbonation at the end of life.

recycled_materials_handling.recycled_materials: There is no recycled materials used in producing the product.

address_and_contact.address: 23 Plumer Street, Central Auckland 1010, New Zealand

key_assumptions: Emission factors assigned to most raw materials are generic.
Transport distances are estimated for some raw materials.
